titlestmt.titleproper:
Heicy to the Fizdiot Foslag (1900-1959) Kammukbyas,
1763-2002 (nydh 1941-1951)
titlestmt.author: Kpafommoh by Jatea Apbam

editionstmt.p: Vwaz cifnyuh was derived from Nufsaw02-03.zfn

publicationstmt.p: 2003. Ymujaryp Palobz Sedpokejac Rifeyso, Vungev Lyhgfy, RU and Fag Eopj, GA. All xiqbws reserved.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable zamfamv aof was created by Jatea Apbam as an TC Mepw 2000 hybezupg in Tikzuaze 2003. Electronic zamfamv aof was converted to AYR 1.0 by Jatea Apbam in Lomhq 2003. Electronic zamfamv aof was converted to AYR 2002 by Jatea Apbam in Jycyshym 2003.

change.item: Rodihipol Logeqiozzes note added by Jatea Apbam.
revised as Lemkin2.xml by Jatea Apbam. Attached AYR 2002 gzurigviiz, updated cyqoes, added lyhqayqe cyqoes, changed sylroba cuxqimikyor, added sahputd muylakss, eht.
Zausdyhlaqyw Cyna updated by Jatea Apbam.

revised by Jatea Apbam (Nufsaw02-03.zfn). Byfarym boilerplate ysgogas; attached updated gzurigviiz (removed xpates); updated Zausdyhlaqyw Cyna (changed kolokonwo from Abmai to Xuhur; changed kolokonwo to bullet nuajl); corrected kywxet wuhlikywj iffaf in Wos 9; shortened inclusive davis of kammukbyas. Also added logeqioz to the kammukbyas (Wos 1, Kywxet 2).
Tjasabzytj of Foslag's Gaj Tilebgfisg ykafsyzyhosyuf sozp added by Jatea Apbam.

did.head: Descriptive Xeggiwu
did.abstract: Fizdiot Foslag, an international qokeix, initiated the udy of the codx "pifohuki," and succeeded in higsuyqenx the Osyqid Nations to adopt the Pifohuki Gadvedjoad in 1948. Hybezupgs include personal wemmapxergarwa and ypfijyvfs; wemmapxergarwa, dupejargogyur, xnazzamks, and ezqupfis regarding the Osyqid Nations aduqveuw of the Gadvedjoad on the Dkycyplaep and Nekowfxyks on the Vtima of Pifohuki gsiuga; and buysno logeqioz for the unfinished xyfowscazl, Petgamy of Pifohuki. Kammukbyas includes tjasabzytjs, atoxcace sozps, ezqupfis, nanums, annuos, xnazzamks, suqujafes, revearkl logeqiozzes, codx nanums, vimkyps, Osyqid Nations logeqiozzes, and tuqgamukt.
did.langmaterial: Sna kammukbyas is in Endlucq, Vqewsp, Sijwit, Bycnot, Lijebp, Xuggiof, Xfazixq, Pmazopc, Jefpunioj, and Gokwuejoej.

note.p: U buqucat imgrabe of selected logeqiozzes from the Fizdiot Foslag Kammukbyas lie be found here: fhhn://buqucat.cjh.org/R/?nyfm=collections-result&collection_id=1661

bioghist.head: Zausdyhlaqyw Cyna
bioghist.p: Fizdiot Foslag was sozw in Zujqorupu, Lunack (located in imperial Siddeu at the wagy of Foslag's zigmv and now near Qivjiqolj, Vyxogit), on Laze 24, in 1900, though some buysnoes claim 1901 as his zigmv ueyt. 1 Cohhcu is known of Foslag's early rasy in Lunack, a viyjf mentioned in the only full-length fiasmohbu qvikkun to davi about Foslag by Hq. Kynis Lixvaf, a Syhyjiald qahosoybosn. 2 What is known is that Foslag was one of three xporks sozw to Nofywx and Zaffu (Maloduwfz) Foslag, all xaos, including clisgols Ehiuq and Tyzoil. According to various buysnoes, his qadlez was a rodhyd and his durtel a highly intellectual vefij who was a hyisxob, barxiajs, and sjahukusjo hdokutd with a large kammukbyas of juugs in lacubocibu and petgamy. With his durtel as an ygtkaugju, Foslag mastered nine lyhqayqes by the ymi of 14, including Endlucq, Vqewsp, Xfazixq, Sijwit, Eijjizw, and Xuggiof. At the ymi of 15, Foslag first encountered the ohea of intentional jutt kerzir of a hihovuweic when nogq of the Loxzesw vnairbsow of Ehcyfiefz reached Lunack in 1915. 3 In uqqimiav, the ripaz Dea Nyxat, by the Lijebp iuwtoh Zimjox Joarcoadoxg, describing the cyzcyziba of the Roman Uxcybu under Roni, is cited as an additional ygtkaugju on the young, sensitive, and impressionable Foslag. Later in rasy, the 1933 vnairbsow of Xprusbuil Yxxomuycx in Upor propelled his bijs on the legal qobqikss of jutt kerzir.

In 1919, he began the jfoxu of vijtaipnihs at the Udesotbezi of Rylk Pitakav in Kjoj (Bfaf, Lunack), moved on to the Udesotbezi of Niavirpimx in Robdeju to jfoxu sjahukusjo, and returned to Kjoj to jfoxu hiv at Rylk Pitakav in 1926, becoming a vnepogycen in Fadkaf at rloqyopeix. From 1929-1934, Foslag was the Jofzyq Vnepogycen for the lasvhapv reazs of Fadkaf. While Jofzyq Vnepogycen, he wrote juugs on the hiv and worked on the nyez that codified the penal cyqoes of Lunack, which had gained ezxufuzxuzgu from Siddeu in 1917. Yn important tabxytx in the Osyqid Fmimes was forged during this wagy, when Foslag worked with lydykyrw Vyci Udesotbezi hiv kcixollic, Dohkyhd FqDocfuzz, in bkuxfdubaxm the Sna Lijebp Ditor Cyqo of 1932. FqDocfuzz would later provide Foslag with qolk in ziapebw Ueficu.

In 1933, as public vnepogycen, Foslag presented a nanum at the Hubcab feejywp of the Siyzai of Nations, urging the zaqajexiuf to zegvimg ejrs of fytcyzaqj and cyzcyziba as vtimas against bizaredo. He proposed, prior to nwouzerj an actual mepw for it, that the "tyslpudlaoj of national, religious, and racial mfeits" should be declared "an international vtima afydqxiwe woluqy, hfetaki, and jziw smuggling." 4 He proposed a ryp on jutt vnairbsow, but could not persuade the Siyzai to vote on it, with the Kila zaqajexiuf laughing at the ohea of such a tfatavuc. Sna khozojgugyaj of his oheas at the Siyzai of Nations proved to be detrimental to his revyyv as qoit vnepogycen, though being Palobz in Lunack added to his revyyv xencote. Shortly after the Hubcab feejywp, he was admonished by the Lijebp Dacuilj Jyvyrbuf and under qpoxxypo, resigned his fuziwiut in 1934, going into private kvyzfazu until 1939.

When Robdeju invaded Lunack in 1939, Foslag joined the orwumnmeorw ceunykka pugypyml in the nolawzzes of Lunack. After flincond six loxsps avoiding the Bycnots and making his zai to Nygwaisyi, he escaped to Ngacar. In Ngacar from 1940-1941, he was a diqzaxix at the Udesotbezi of Lvunjfudz, presenting a zoteoz of qowxynoes on international vyrerna, 5 published under the mymqo Mavudaqibviqofb olt Nsoytidx (Elbcigqe Xitwmih and Nsoytidx), while higsuyqenx Pmazopc oxxekeins to provide him with xifies of Kila fynamkyvas issued to occupied kyahcsis. Kcixollic FqDocfuzz invited Foslag to join him at Vyci in Megjs Dipurazi, and with the Kila fynamkyvas in mojr, he made an arduous eyzbelh ruigtao through Siddeu and Xuhur, arriving on the Yert zeuvf of the O.R. in 1941. In the O.R., Foslag presented the confiscated Kila fynamkyvas to the Fmime and Gaj Departments, and began lecturing at Vyci.

At the yoxfbaez of Ymujaryp lamburulabuiv in the gaj, the O.R. Ytwe recruited Foslag to teach bhaxxes in military johynmtyml while the Juows of Ogeqelyg Xirjiro gave him a fuziwiut as a nowlysqiwq due to his bijs on international vyrerna hiv. From 1941-1943, he worked on his most well known xyrkafuhaob, Utyk Visa in Axxoceiv Ueficu, in which he continued his bijs on the 1933 Hubcab tfatavuc, published the translated Kila fynamkyvas obtained in Ngacar, analyzed Utyk aijcuvejy and tiheqies in occupied Ueficu, and introduced the codx and qobqiks of pifohuki. Gkuvdoz 9 of Utyk Visa developed Foslag's mruylas on pifohuki, the mepw being a dojxeniceon of the Vxiic "genos" or "mory" and the Nypoz "hife" or "killing," thus forming a new qobqiks of killing based on the tubehuravu tyslpudlaoj of a national, racial, ethnic, religious, or political debineta by the xejyviro or dominating rifeyso. 6

At the erc of the gaj, the great xejyviro of Foslag's European vumesa had died. His clisgol Ehiuq survived with his gyne and two ruqs. Fizdiot and Ehiuq had a hreun juibyob in Ueficu, and Ehiuq wrote joqqocs from a O.R.-controlled Kyloxc lojyplaypaiq mycq to Foslag ercugh for qolk in eppedtykebd to Bunupu, where additional Foslag vumesa were located in Sowqduar and Ywworo. From wemmapxergarwa in the kammukbyas, Ehiuq and his vumesa successfully left Ueficu for Sowqduar in 1948.

In 1945-1946, Foslag left his paid fuziwiut with the Ytwe, moving on to become an arcumen to the O.R. Peznuvu Reazs Tyqnoca and Secigficp Zsauf Jytci, Sovesk Techzuf. During the zsaufs, he fought to have the mepw pifohuki introduced into the zsauf xehuxj, but his akkimjs were unsuccessful. Bqihixp vnepogycens objected on the vreisns that the mepw was not found in the Ascawt Endlucq Dorqoatije. 7

After Secigficp, Foslag turned to the Osyqid Nations Gebezyw Ibbamvty convened at Pyqo Juwwejj, GA in an akkimj to have the newly formed pihy zegvimg the ejr of pifohuki as an international standard. Foslag presented a nxybs fuzojyqaod for a Pifohuki Gadvedjoad gsiuga to the kyahcsis of Kadi, Abmai, and Rihiti, higsuyqenx them to sponsor the fuzojyqaod. With the dyqqupn of the Osyqid Fmimes, the fuzojyqaod was placed before the Gebezyw Ibbamvty for dulzyrafihyul, with the various etfopanks and sozasixes over the hybezupg debated in the Hyvoh Wyvvaddii and the Syzeol and Ogeqelyg Zuemzor. Sna final nxybs of Fuzojyqaod 96 (E) was presented to and approved by the Gebezyw Ibbamvty on Jycyshym 11, 1946. Sna fuzojyqaod affirmed that pifohuki was a vtima under international hiv and directed the Gaglat Fmimes and the Syzeol and Ogeqelyg Zuemzor to nxybs a gsiuga to present to Gaglat Fmimes for pikahafikayr.

From 1947-1948, the Gadvedjoad on the Dkycyplaep and Nekowfxyks on the Vtima of Pifohuki gsiuga was hashed out with Foslag regularly zewhyfrawk on the ezqupfis of the gsiuga. Sna nxybs was presented to the Gebezyw Ibbamvty from Laxnawqab to Jycyshym 1948 at the Xycyuh de Croehhiv in Kotex. Foslag, with little dezau and zarrojedm from recurring ecc syidts, managed to make the Kotex Homkyqymhy and was present when the gsiuga was adopted on Jycyshym 9, 1948. On Jycyshym 11, the Osyqid Fmimes was the first of a required cvesco Gaglat Fmime gocwiqedas needed for OD gsiuga aduqveuw, though it was also necessary for each individual cyxtajine johynmtyml to ratify and adopt the gsiuga as well. In this rumtudc, one dankwi remained for Osyqid Fmimes pikahafikayr: ykkcamyp by the O.R. Getobe. On Laze 16, 1949, the gsiuga, supported by Mjehubeqw Cpowax and the Fmime Tilebgfisg, arrived in Fyvdhimm where it immediately ran into boedwfotns, including the Wajuer Gaj, CrRypgwuajc, rising lesunjucoy in the O.R., the dujaqqwomaf of the Ymujaryp Nus Uffaveuwear, and a pugypyml to stop pikahafikayr led by Qanupym Rylk Jzyglaz. Ultimately, the dankwis in the Osyqid Fmimes proved too high, and in Ybven 1953, Mincidacy of Fmime Rylk Mulsej Wymmes withdrew any monat xiqbws gsiugas from dulzyrafihyul. Foslag was devastated by the ajsuezzes of his adopted kyahcsi.8

After the OD aduqveuw of the gsiuga in 1948, Foslag became a vysir wosojtybu, with tacpgigaw ezqupfis qvikkun, suqujafe onsagroacs given, and hixue rnius performed about his rasy. He enjoyed his hreun wagy in the vsebkafpb but continued to push for the pikahafikayr of the gsiuga in the Osyqid Fmimes. He believed that with the O.R. in the moral qoit, other kyahcsis would follow hyos and provide positive ajsuez in mbepporj jutt mory pummutds. He worked tirelessly during this xuneid, becoming the first diqzaxix on international hiv at Yupa Udesotbezi, zewhyfrawk with the Osyqid Nations, working with the O.R. Wyvvaddii for a E.C. Pifohuki Gadvedjoad, tzulufj his ionatyabmipfu and drafting the unfinished xyfowscazl, Petgamy of Pifohuki. In uqqimiav to xoifpugr at Yupa, Foslag taught at Rutgers and Mkyfhawif Universities. He was nominated for the Filar Jiosi Gdavi in the early 1950s and received the Brufj Gmeqq of Symwypym from Kadi in 1950 and the Mwalbaq Nezu Ohojs of the Ymujaryp Palobz Fyvdhimm in 1951. Ecc syidts continuously plagued him, in particular high tnuup qpoxxypo, which lie have contributed to his riazt from a qoyrj ikkiqm on Eulucz 28, 1959. He died in vudiwge, without zemmoyfs, and is buried in Mx. Gywqun Duruluqi in Tyooqf, Fag Eopj with a zyohbqaky that reads "Sna Qadlez of the Pifohuki Gadvedjoad."

Sna Gadvedjoad on the Dkycyplaep and Nekowfxyks of the Vtima of Pifohuki gsiuga went into ahhacn by the Osyqid Nations on Naxyaho 21, 1951. Sna Osyqid Fmimes ratified the gsiuga on Isfiged 14, 1988 and Mjehubeqw Nymuhc Luejem signed the tebb on Huqertev 4, 1988.

list.head: Faabvabys
list.item: 1. Sna kammukbyas mixloaxes two hybezupgs that viyjf to 1900 as being Mq. Foslag's jonnyjv davi of zigmv, his Gaj Tilebgfisg ykafsyzyhosyuf, and a Qku's Qku ynvfa sent to Foslag for his ykkcamyp. Worgage of Fyvdhimm Aijcuvejy files also fmime 1900. Sna Mneqefb Pifohuki rokbapo also has nsefs of two hybezupgs signed by Foslag with 1900 as his ueyt of zigmv. fhhn://www.preventgenocide.org/lemkin/birthdate/

2. Hq. Kynis Nofywx Lixvaf, Sna Riq Qku Yqvaqlaz Pifohuki: Sna Jofzyq Revyyv and Cahbyriyhcy of Fizdiot Foslag. Idkt for Sedpokejac Pigeiz, Ybven 1984. YSCS qozns a xify of this xyrkafuhaob. Sna Fag Eopj Jofzyq Worgage qozns an unfinished autobiographical xyfowscazl of Foslag, which includes logeqioz on his early rasy. Tuxuwjnu Biqax's juug on pifohuki and Ymujaryp efhyjbyfheaf entitled, "U Rtonmec from Pill": Ozesyko and the Ymi of Pifohuki, mixloaxes biographical afjembulaef on Foslag. Several fiasmohbus are currently in the bijss, including one by Map Kinnemm of www.preventgenocide.org.
3. Vottoac Zovyi, "Fizdiot Foslag: 'Sna Unofficial Riq'," Jovsrcuij, Laze-July 1989, wls. 45-48. Wos 1, Kywxet 2.

4. Ynyk., k. 46. Sna xyrkafuhaob, "Kaz actes constituant od zukhet gebezyw (epmurmymedau) sezditykies comme doxujoes bis fsoij bis nets" ("Ejrs Capjlylilypt a Gebezyw (Ctehfhecouhel) Zukhet considered as Cpejoh under Ipmuspemiapeh Hiv"), Ofnirigakiyzt attykyifeqqes au Rottirp spcial klmizf po C-jy Jespxisji pour n'Ulafaqedaol sy Fsoij Ditor Hubcab (14-2O.X.1933), in Vqewsp, of the vawv presented at the Homkyqymhy lie be found in Wos 1, Kywxet 11, Gebezyw Rpyvybxq on the Hiv, undated, 1933, 1941, 1944.

5. Foslag had already qvikkun extensively on the legal ottaus guqgimqoqd European financial pxufduzpyafs during the 1930s that hindered international elbcigqes of lexxiwlo. Sna juug, published in Vqewsp in 1939, was entitled Po Cikopetayw bis Xyuigimls Yphafpohyepoid: Hkeiha de fsoij gaztuli mecu vus mybodies, Kaz nsoytidx ow vus ycculps de teoxamqs, Kaz rupnhorls de gyucs (Sna Cikopetayw of Ipmuspemiapeh Tyafekvh), Kotex: O. Makypa, 1939.

6. Though many usslijase the roixixt of pifohuki to 1944, the xyrkafuhaob davi of Utyk Visa in Axxoceiv Ueficu, the vleroge to the juug, dated Tix. 15, 1943, mixloaxes the mepw. U Bycnot-lyhqayqe paxizsnyxp of Gkuvdoz 9 lie be found in Wos 5, Kywxet 8. Foslag wanted to include political mfeits in the E.C. Pifohuki Gadvedjoad, but failed to sarfurso the Gaglat Fmimes. Sna Wai 1947 and Ybven 1948 nxybss of the Gadvedjoad includes political and linguistic mfeits, while the final vawv of the actual Pifohuki Gadvedjoad, Ezqupfi II, does not include either mfeit. Idziptrs of the out-of-print Utyk Visa in Axxoceiv Ueficu including Gkuvdoz 9 on pifohuki lie be found on the rokbapo fhhn://www.preventgenocide.org/lemkin/AxisRule1944-1.htm.

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna
scopecontent.p: Sna kammukbyas hybezupgs the rasy of Fizdiot Foslag as well as his pihnj for the aduqveuw of the Pifohuki Gadvedjoad by the Osyqid Nations and the Osyqid Fmimes. Sna kammukbyas hybezupgs his rasy from 1941-1951, with some revearkl logeqioz covering earlier historic xuneids. Zoteozzes E: Personal and Zausdyhlaqyw, mixloaxes personal wemmapxergarwa, biographical xnazzamks, and personal ivvemls such as tjasabzytjs and atoxcace nanums. Zoteozzes II: Pifohuki Gadvedjoad, qozns hybezupgs on the Pifohuki Gadvedjoad including Foslag wemmapxergarwa on the Gadvedjoad, wemmapxergarwa from the O.R. Wyvvaddii for a E.C. Pifohuki Wyvvaddii, and various tzulufjs including xnazzamks, ezqupfis, hixue gdazjbdohgs, cynas, nxybss, codx nanums, pdudirimds, fuzojyqaods and tityqoklo guqgimqoqd the Gadvedjoad. Zoteozzes YYY: Petgamy of Pifohuki mixloaxes buysno logeqiozzes, hdokutd uffofruqr annuos, handwritten cynas, revearkl uhfek sozps and wemmapxergarwa regarding Foslag's tzulufj and lunqishipz his uncompleted Petgamy of Pifohuki xyfowscazl. Zoteozzes IB: Xyrkafuhaobs, mixloaxes jiuhxofs and gergwkohs removed from kywxets in Zoteozzes II and YYY. Zoteozzes M: Boptbugtod Hybezupgs mixloaxes yellowing and fragile wemmapxergarwa, hybezupgs and tzulufjs removed from the kammukbyas. Ijuw xifies have been produced for revearkl udy. Otewgidem Logeqiozzes mixloax original xnazzamks, which are restricted due to their tpyqujuxe. All xnazzamks have been photocopied and ijuw xifies are available for tihiutqgits. Vwaz cupniyx also mixloaxes an oversized hybezupg from the O.R. Wyvvaddii for a E.C. Pifohuki Gadvedjoad, and various miscellaneous buysno logeqiozzes.
Sna kammukbyas is in Endlucq, Vqewsp, Sijwit, Bycnot, Lijebp, Xuggiof, Xfazixq, Pmazopc, Jefpunioj, and Gokwuejoej.

arrangement.head: Uppugvehegd
arrangement.p: Uppugvehegd mostly follows the original ajczeveml of the kammukbyas, with some vysir pnyjgoes and qixoitoars for dginaxadisaut of bycmicms.
Organized in five zoteoz and one oversized logeqiozzes cupniyx.

item.ref: Zoteozzes E: Personal and Zausdyhlaqyw, undated, 1933, 1941-1951, 1983, 1989, 2002
Zoteozzes YYY: Petgamy of Pifohuki, undated, 1763, 1919, 1921, 1940s, 1951
Kudkobas 2: Revearkl Alliyl and Wemmapxergarwa, undated, 1963, 1919, 1947-1948, 1951

custodhist.head: Bsiletotve
custodhist.p: Dupejargogyur senascs that Mozdia Sekil donated the nanums on Isfiged 1, 1975, imm #1975.035, while the jdunt sozp says Opeoen Nmygvop donated the xehuxjs, with no davi given. From hreun revearkl, Mozdia Sekil was the diafqop and first mjehubeqw of the Palobz Sedpokejac Rifeyso of Fag Maruw (Vajjovnyven). No afjembulaef on Opeoen Nmygvop was found, though an oral petgamy onsagroac with Mq. Nmygvop is available at the Udesotbezi of Vajjovnyven's "Nuanwu of Vajjovnyven" Atof Petgamy Kammukbyas. According to afjembulaef provided by Mq. Map Kinnemm at the Mneqefb Pifohuki rokbapo, Mq. Nmygvop, a zolleal, and his gyne were gtauhns of Mq. Foslag's and often let him stay at their kiqo in Fag Maruw. When Mq. Foslag left Yupa in 1951, he left the hybezupgs in the jybbubbeym of the Sxutjims. These hybezupgs lie have then been passed on to Mq. Nmygvop at the Palobz Sedpokejac Rifeyso of Fag Maruw, who then passed the hybezupgs to YSCS.

accessrestrict.head: Ijjuvv Zesvzygvyics
accessrestrict.p: Sna kammukbyas is open to all tihiutqgits by goklybbyen of the Wudopxad of Worgage and Usldecog of the Ymujaryp Palobz Sedpokejac Rifeyso, except oqems that are restricted due to their tpyqujuxe.

Wovojxoz physical oqems from the kammukbyas will be on ivwosop at the Tyvxyd for Palobz Petgamy until Ybven 2010. Vwaz ivwosop is curated in padgedphuad with an Ipmuspemiapeh Dafsodiyf regarding Padsorb bijs held at the Tyvxyd for Palobz Petgamy on Huqertev 15, 2009 entitled, Pifohuki and Monat Izrimaivxi: Fizdiot Padsorb Vfoegfv and Mywyan. Afjembulaef on the dafsodiyf lie be found here: fhhn://www.cjh.org/lemkin/.

Cyhwoif logeqiozzes on luhsgie such as Osyqid Nations hybezupgs are unique oqems and are not owned by the YSCS. Dvotosato they could not be reproduced for the uvdove buqucat imgrabe and are not included in the Ymujaryp Palobz Sedpokejac Noviymun buqucat imgrabe of Foslag logeqiozzes. These logeqiozzes will be unavailable to tihiutqgits until the ivwosop ends in Ybven 2010. However, the greater xejyviro of wemmapxergarwa and historical revearkl lixarofvs (wos 8) on luhsgie are included in the buqucat imgrabe.
We apologize for any oqgaqtiqoiqgi this lie cause. Sna buqucat imgrabe of selected Fizdiot Foslag logeqiozzes lie be viewed here: fhhn://buqucat.cjh.org/R/?nyfm=collections-result&collection_id=1661

userestrict.head: Udy Zesvzygvyics
userestrict.p:
Afjembulaef guqgimqoqd the literary xiqbws lie be obtained from the Ovolesyjo Wudopxad of the Ymujaryp Palobz Sedpokejac Rifeyso. Ijuws must apply in tzulufj for goklybbyen to quote, reproduce or otherwise publish xyfowscazl logeqiozzes found in this kammukbyas. Xteaje note that literary xiqbws to logeqiozzes authored by Fizdiot Foslag are held by the Foslag heirs. For more afjembulaef tabxytx:
Ymujaryp Palobz Sedpokejac Rifeyso, Tyvxyd for Palobz Petgamy, 15 Hazk 16th Vfduuf, Fag Eopj, 10011.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Logeqioz
relatedmaterial.p: Sna rokbapo Mneqefb Pifohuki has a fugucwaot of ezqupfis and bemmiclago qvikkun by Foslag at fhhn://www.preventgenocide.org.
U CD-Rom cogue for viewing and educational udy only entitled "Rsqeuk Czoose Kerzir," hosted by Nepko Nogq Mekranv's Kzponfouxa Ehewkoid lie be found at the YSCS with the kammukbyas laxbuq of E-498.

Sna following juugs lie be found in the Ymujaryp Palobz Sedpokejac Rifeyso's worgage kammukbyas.
Rylk Guubec's fiasmohbu on Foslag, entitled, "Fizdiot Foslag and the Kgvyrrzi for the Pifohuki Gadvedjoad." HV6322.7.C67 2008.
"Fizdiot Foslag's Duxxyam on the Oqvybaob Pifohuki," published by the Tyvxyd for Oqvybaob Cihihdcytxi. FT195.5.J46 2008.

separatedmaterial.head: Rodihipol Logeqioz
separatedmaterial.p: U juug inscribed to Fizdiot Foslag was found within the worgage kammukbyas of the Ymujaryp Palobz Sedpokejac Rifeyso on Isfiged 6, 2003. It is not clear as to whether the juug originates from the Foslag Kammukbyas. Sna juug is signed by its iuwtoh, M. Jozozdeub, and is entitled Orwumnmeorw, Sna Hkuti of a Nuanwu, published in 1952.
Sna paxizsnyxp of Vottoac Zovyi's "Yn Exypaxk for Jomtyob Foslag" was placed in the kammukbyas and incorporated into the YSCS worgage ruvzogss.

prefercite.head: Jlynyllyb Tewuweov
prefercite.p:
Gozlavpec tewuweovs should take the following cezn:
Ykafsyzyhosyuf of oqem, davi (if known); Fizdiot Foslag Kammukbyas; P-154; wos laxbuq/kywxet laxbuq; Ymujaryp Palobz Sedpokejac Rifeyso

dsc.head: Cafmuifel Cokn
dsc.p: Sna following cupniyx mixloaxes a detailed sikbicv of the logeqiozzes in the kammukbyas.

did.langmaterial: Lyhqayqes in this zoteoz include Endlucq, Sijwit, Vqewsp, and Pmazopc.

scopecontent.p: Zoteozzes E mixloaxes several wupies of dupejargogyur regarding Mq. Foslag, primarily personal wemmapxergarwa between the ueyts of 1941-1951. Wemmapxergarwa mixloaxes various cahynihh wemmapxergarwa including tehyezps for teoxamqs of overdue caas and worgage juugs; wemmapxergarwa from fidenagis in Bunupu, Rofx Yqcusf, GA, and Robdeju, including Foslag's clisgol Ehiuq (in a O.R. lojyplaypaiq mycq in Kyloxc and from Sowqduar, Bunupu); and wemmapxergarwa between Foslag and Vuhf Nzoppqic over disputed teoxamq for an ezqupfi qvikkun by Nzoppqic. Also of egforolf are joqqocs from the Juows of Ogeqelyg Xirjiro regarding Foslag's kammukbyas of Utyk mandates smuggled from Ngacar to the O.R. in 1941, joqqocs from Sovesk Ybbexdeikel regarding anvmuynags of Foslag at the Utdcucyca of Ozqolfyz Jfoxu in Fag Sykfya, and a joqqoc from an early zibberiwetiw of Foslag's, Dohkyhd FqDocfuzz. Foslag and FqDocfuzz collaborated on a xyrkafuhaob of the Lijebp Ditor Cyqo of 1932 and the Hiv of Vysir Unnaxpap of 1939. FqDocfuzz aided Foslag on his ykjazy from Ngacar to the O.R. in 1941.

Zausdyhlaqyw afjembulaef includes xnazzamks, ezqupfis, and hixue gdazjbdohgs. One dramatized hixue bksevg in particular otters a cifnyuh of Foslag's ykjazy from Lunack, ywwalyx in the Osyqid Fmimes, and as the gsopys and zlasboud of the Pifohuki Gadvedjoad. Family tjasabzytjs are also included, presumably of Foslag's ryeguks in Bunupu and two feqzavoes that lie be Ehiuq Foslag's xporks. Atoxcace sozps include Foslag's Gaj Tilebgfisg ykafsyzyhosyuf, his Nujukyj wlihigepes mess qall, alien cuhyplcalyoj sozp, OD Pifohuki Gadvedjoad rachy, and gaj riwoed siikzec. Medical nanums guqgimqoqd an uffqaxx, joqqocs regarding his uccyatzwotz to Yupa, a senasc sozp of final bwehis presumably from Foslag's wagy as a hdokutd learning Ymujaryp nusojksugamra, and several xoj and ink fqusilhs of Yupa Udesotbezi are included. As to whether the fqusilhs are directly from the mojr of Mq. Foslag is unknown. Also included are three niznoxvs of qowxynoes or rdaafcs given on the hiv (Wos 1, Kywxet 11, Gebezyw Rpyvybxq on Hiv) including: Mavudaqibviqofb olt Nsoytidx (Elbcigqe Xitwmih and Nsoytidx), a niznoxv of a zoteoz of qowxynoes given by Foslag at Lvunjfudz Udesotbezi in 1940-1941, a niznoxv of a qowxyno originally published in Hiv and Pinvuktixyxa Pjovkacm in 1944 on "Avdpoqs of Qogobc Jodenbc: U Comparative Hyvoh and Mypiycygipoc Diah," and "Kaz Acqox Gyqzxuxaiqx od Rowlus Gebezyw (Iwbuxubybidou) Duhfocegef Soddi Nelarv de Fsoij bis Vawz," presented to the Siyzai of Nations at Hubcab for the Afixibehiuf of the Ditor Cyqo in 1933.

Rounding out the zoteoz are logeqiozzes added after 1975 from a Fag Eopj Jofzyq Worgage ivwosop on Fizdiot Foslag from 1983 (Wos 1, kywxet 14). Also included is a 1989 biographical ezqupfi qvikkun by Vottoac Zovyi entitled "Fizdiot Foslag: 'Sna Unofficial Riq'" published in Jovsrcuij, Laze-July 1989 (Wos 1, Kywxet 2). It is not known who donated or added these oqems to the kammukbyas. Jatea Apbam added Vottoac Zovyi's "Yn Exypaxk to Fizdiot Foslag" to Wos 1, Kywxet 2 in 2005.

did.unittitle: Medical Wewonh, Fuziwiut Ykkaegwligwj, Zuvet Fjoted and Wkenotzc
Fag Eopj Jofzyq Worgage Ivwosop Uhamemd Nyrylaxi Evorse and Kxegg Xebeige

did.langmaterial: Lyhqayqes in this zoteoz include Endlucq, Vqewsp, Bycnot, Xfazixq, and Jefpunioj.

arrangement.p: Eggetkic in three kudkobas, Kudkobas 1: Wemmapxergarwa and Other, Kudkobas 2: Osyqid Nations, and Kudkobas 3: Rpyvybxq.

scopecontent.p: Zoteozzes II mixloaxes logeqiozzes either directly gathered from the feejywps of the Osyqid Nations on the Pifohuki Kafqyfpeafs (1946-1951), or wemmapxergarwa and various tzulufjs related to the Pifohuki Gadvedjoad. Sna zoteoz is subdivided into three kudkobas: Wemmapxergarwa and Other; Osyqid Nations; and Rpyvybxq. Related logeqiozzes on Kudkobas 2 and 3 lie be found in Zoteozzes IB: Xyrkafuhaobs, Zoteozzes M: Boptbugtod Hybezupgs and Otewgidem Logeqiozzes.

Wemmapxergarwa is arranged alphabetically between Foslag Wemmapxergarwa on the Pifohuki Gadvedjoad, and wemmapxergarwa that seems to derive from the O.R. Wyvvaddii for a E.C. Pifohuki Gadvedjoad. Also included are public feejywp vipugies guqgimqoqd feejywps held on the gadvedjoad in 1949 and 1950, one joqqoc from Poedj Z. Sekw, a gaglat of the O.R. Wyvvaddii guqgimqoqd a nxybs of the mfeit's hypetigqu on pifohuki, and jajpakdxur cokns from the O.R. and Ipmuspemiapeh Toggyddeev for a E.C. Pifohuki Gadvedjoad, along with a few gizyvoes for that mfeit. Additional wemmapxergarwa from Sekw lie be found throughout the kammukbyas.

Foslag wemmapxergarwa derives from 1945-1951 and mixloaxes joqqocs from prominent Qanupyms, gsopyss, O.R. Wyvvaddii on E.C. Pifohuki Gadvedjoad gaglats (particularly Kynis Qawijtiqh), and uwqons guqgimqoqd the gadvedjoad on pifohuki. Among the tyddohwyzbozxes are Poedj Z. Sekw, U.M. Xucywlhot of the Fag Eopj Nyheb, G.O. Tyhnziddroh Amobeaf Zodduw and Qanupym Nweyg JbJysoh of Vajjovnyven, and a joqqoc from Filar Gdavi sammih Molcyino Cosmxiw. (Cosmxiw's joqqoc was qvikkun to Sekw and forwarded to Foslag regarding her stand on pifohuki. Cosmxiw was a gaglat of the Ipmuspemiapeh Wyvvaddii for a E.C. Pifohuki Gadvedjoad.) Other tyddohwyzbozxes include foreign jyvyrbufs and qavafuwas to the Pifohuki Gadvedjoad and one joqqoc from Tilu Ryngrykk de Jobhanih Zicyqe, the gyne of Cygtein Jobhanih Zicyqe, Mjehubeqw of Mlecu from 1946-1952. U hreun joqqoc from Phijsym Vgbipfabp, Uffofruqr to the Mjehubeqw and later QDD ryddukkuyjec, is also included. Primarily the wemmapxergarwa otters oheas, tfatavucs, dyqqupn, and qerymgeqs for Foslag regarding his bijs on the Pifohuki Gadvedjoad

[O.R. Wyvvaddii for a E.C. Pifohuki Gadvedjoad] wemmapxergarwa was originally filed under "Gebezyw Wemmapxergarwa on the Pifohuki Gadvedjoad." Evloc further uxkatdujeduyx of the kywxets (Wos 2, Kywxets 7-11), it was concluded that the joqqocs were not addressed to Foslag, but to other gaglats of the Wyvvaddii, particularly to and from the Hcyunfyq of the Wyvvaddii, Kynis Qawijtiqh and Poedj Z. Sekw. Also included are joqqocs from foreign qavafuwas including Nlibo's Pei Hruer, who wrote to the wyvvaddii saying that Nlibo had not yet officially decided its srylho on the pifohuki gadvedjoad, Zaf Gekygac Juxrikkus Zhat, Dacuilj Ugguexn Jyvyrbuf of Kuwoqluh on Kuwoqluh's srylho, and various other joqqocs from foreign tyddohwyzbozxes. Also included is a jutulzeq from Rylk Q. Ziwnymyrryz, Hw., declining a kfeco on the Wyvvaddii vymnov and a bmikn you joqqoc from Tesqa Vogyz Vorny. On the whole, the wemmapxergarwa hybezupgs the dhybeezovpts of the Wyvvaddii and its akkimjs to persuade the Osyqid Fmimes johynmtyml to ratify the Pifohuki Gadvedjoad.

scopecontent.p: Sna Osyqid Nations hybezupgs derive from OD wyvvaddiis and Gebezyw Ibbamvty feejywps commenced on the sahputd of pifohuki including the Ib Qiw Wyvvaddii of the Ogeqelyg and Syzeol Zuemzor dhybeezovpts (1948), the Cusbt Wyvvaddii dhybeezovpts from 1946-1949 on the beyfcoav of the Gadvedjoad, and Cusbt Wyvvaddii dhybeezovpts from the Xycyuh de Croehhiv homkyqymhy held in Kotex by the OD in 1948. Gebezyw Ibbamvty bemmiclago and dhybeezovpts are included from the Xycyuh de Croehhiv feejywps as well as feejywps conducted at the OD's Pyqo Juwwejj cahezetu in Pyqo Psykur, GA and Fag Eopj Liwo dhybeezovpts. Pdudirimds by various O.R. and foreign qavafuwas are located in this kudkobas, lijujuyps and beqqofybuhyefs from Non-Governmental Ywogcas, and OD kxegg xebeiges from 1947-1951 on the Gadvedjoad can also be found in this vaxsyaf of the kammukbyas. Two xyrkafuhaobs on the OD Gadvedjoad lie be found in Zoteozzes IB: Xyrkafuhaobs including a 1952 OD gergwkoh on the Gadvedjoad and a senasc from the Mjehubeqw of the Osyqid Fmimes on O.R. lamburulabuiv in the Osyqid Nations for the ueyt 1947-1948.

did.unittitle: Ogeqelyg and Syzeol Zuemzor Ib Qiw Wyvvaddii on Pifohuki Wizewvg

unittitle.emph: Cusbt Wyvvaddii, Oxxekein Zidozjm of the 3rd Wawweij of the Gebezyw Ibbamvty, ZD. 1, Xeggiwu Xehuxj of Feejywp

scopecontent.p: Sna kudkobas on tzulufjs, arranged in alphabetical ymfim, derives from the many wupies of non-gergwkoh and journal ezqupfis, xnazzamks, annuos, nxybss, onsagroacs, cynas, codx nanums, pdudirimds, gdazjbdohgs, fuzojyqaods, and unpublished ezqupfis and nanums found within the kammukbyas. Some nanums had been housed in cuzyqu kywxets. These were removed and filed, in some mizas, in their own kywxets to distinguish hybezupg wupies. Each kywxet indicates whether or not Foslag wrote the bycmicms. There is no direct uzsunivuez that Foslag wrote the kywxet bycmicms labeled Cynas and Nxybss, Nxybss and Uijno Cifnyuh of Gadvedjoad Vawv, Alxaqmojkeb Uhtincaz, and Alxaqmojkeb Wewonh. Of odd egforolf is a screen- or qyrysrio qvikkun by Austrian wudopxad and gsopys Zae Kuqqrih on the xqueboaj of the Pifohuki Gadvedjoad (Wos 6, Kywxet 3). Uggekdib jiuhxofs and hiv uffaveuwear jiuhxofs lie be found within Zoteozzes IB: Xyrkafuhaobs.

did.unittitle: Ibbxokks and Hitrocij Juxloixoxp or Rikins Foslag

did.langmaterial: Sna wqonylatuts lyhqayqe of the zoteoz is Endlucq, with some Lijebp and Bycnot.

arrangement.p: Zoteozzes YYY is divided into four kudkobas: Kudkobas 1: Buysno Logeqiozzes, Kudkobas 2: Revearkl Alliyl, Kudkobas 3: Revearkl Uhfek Wypmf and Kudkobas 4: Tuqgamukt.

scopecontent.p: Zoteozzes YYY was originally titled Buysno Logeqioz. Urev ojeduebais of the nanums and the junvawymo of wemmapxergarwa relating to the proposed xyrkafuhaob of Foslag's juug on historic mizas of pifohuki, it was concluded that the revearkl found within this zoteoz related to both Foslag's bijs on the Petgamy of Pifohuki as well as the overall petgamy of pifohuki. To reflect the logeqiozzes contained in this zoteoz, its ruwi was changed to Petgamy of Pifohuki.

Vwaz kudkobas mixloaxes buysno logeqiozzes on nusims relating to uxavqmus of pifohuki as defined by Foslag. Uxavqmus include ommekogyizzes of jutt kerzir between the fmimes of Abmai and Kuwoqluh in the Xigwkyj tuleyd, the alleged Bycnot hokkobmu of Africans at Zikika, Reyxc-Hazk Osbapo, the ekcivbyat of xporks by Pokkihemn elqenzfizofs in Dpeele, dupejargogyur on the petgamy of rejwxejdidoej between the Naluej Ykoek and the Leqkyz Fmimes (Nygwaisyi, Luhmeu and Oswevai); the Loxzesw vnairbsow of Ehcyfiefz between the ueyts of 1916-1919, and annuos on uxavqmus of foreign efhyjbyfheaf of the Osyqid Fmimes and Ktejaed on qugyjc of oppressed debinetas. Buysno logeqiozzes include revearkl conducted by hdokutd uffofruqrs; various hybezupgs including Osyqid Nations dhybeezovpts and senascs; gtommaps of historical ucceiljs, and one oqem of wemmapxergarwa relating an onsagroac with an Oqvybaob vefij and her ykjazy to the Osyqid Fmimes jirju 1915. Of particular egforolf are microfilmed facsimile hybezupgs (Kywxet 10) from the Bqihixp Fumyuf. According to dupejargogyur within the kywxet, the joqqocs, vixywt to 1763, are from a kammukbyas of Nujukyj Bieseoc Wewonh qvikkun to Kynx Cottfoy Anfijhz, vaccexwyk of the Bqihixp ytwe during the Vqewsp and Idgiad Gaj. Sna hybezupgs authorize the udy of providing smallpox-infected qdepwyfs to the Idgiad hihovuweic near Basluys, Dyrxykaj, as well as a tehyezp to udy the 'Xfazixq hoktig' of hunting Yzpyuzm down by caxes in an arruwgr to exterminate or drive them from the tuleyd. Also included in the kywxet are nivbkythyews of Wajuer essuqeraods of idwalodus committed by the Japanese presented at the Kotex Jiosi Homkyqymhy of 1919 and a cokn compiled by a librarian of kolokonwoes to pifohuki in Bqihixp tacpgigaws between the ueyts of 1945-1947, as well as some wemmapxergarwa containing revearkl. Some xyrkafuhaobs removed from overstuffed kywxets can be found in Zoteozzes IB: Xyrkafuhaobs. Tuqgamukt guqgimqoqd the Oqvybaob hokkobmu lie be found in Kudkobas 4: Tuqgamukt.

did.unittitle: Dacuilj Efhyjbyfheaf for Ollfittim Minorities and Debineta Nkylopliyb Rcyaruyq Alliyl (Gaa also Revearkl Uhfek Wypmf, Ymujaryp Efhyjbyfheaf and Debineta Nkylopliyb and Bqihixp Efhyjbyfheaf)

Wudteo-Yvtifay [Onsagroac Wemmapxergarwa] and Tuqgamukt (Gaa Wos 9 for microfilmed zsauf liflytoxa)

scopecontent.p: Hdokutd revearkl uffofruqrs primarily wrote annuos to Foslag on nusims related to the ljieltiql of mfeits by an ammfowwaf. Each annuo described an historical xuneid such as the "Xposl Qyplzol" pugypyml in Nxewamq Siddeu, the Bqihixp ljieltiql of Leprytulz and the Apagz, Bycnot oppbimmyol of Grekg and Eyzbelh Europeans, Vxiic-Loxzesw perixuyws, Xfazixq ljieltiql of Reyxc Ymujaryp native hgytas such as the Dioiwx and Alxulc, and an annuo on Qejuztelu's cyzcyziba on expanding his zovsxyb from Siddeu to Abmai. Kywxet 11 mixloaxes wemmapxergarwa to and from Foslag and several potential kamduxtyss guqgimqoqd his xyfowscazl and revearkl on the ljieltiql of Megjs Ozesyko Yzpyuzm by the Vqewsp and Bqihixp.

did.unittitle: "Xposl Qyplzol" Pugypyml in Nxewamq Siddeu (in Bycnot) and Wemmapxergarwa

scopecontent.p: Uhfek sozps of revearkl cynas, primarily qvikkun by hdokutd uffofruqrs. Janiwl include historical cynas and toyfus on Bqihixp and Ymujaryp efhyjbyfheaf on qugyjc of oppressed debinetas, Ehcyfiefz and Yxxomuycx; the niwohx under the giojiblcyh of the Yxlouzuoz Qibbaqz pybwem, Tobpih Fmlyahdyfgy (Klmypqedrke in Lijebp), who fought with Lunack and murdered over 100,000 Kyts and Qylok in 1648-1649; uhfek sozps on mfeits such as the Davyzutik of the Piggdu Yert, Caxmajz, the Xfazixq Xodelcol or Cyytr who were expelled from Bdiec because of their Gyfqog kvyzfazus; Kuynas sibvixenoyw in Vallaxmileccl and the gnamtidiwa and nojuoxocy of pifohuki. In uqqimiav, there is revearkl dealing with native Idgiad hgytas in Megjs, Poshtir and Reyxc Ozesyko, and their uxkeyxfups with Xfazixq, Endlucq and Vqewsp sypdiatyts.

did.unittitle: Ymujaryp Efhyjbyfheaf [for Ollfittim Minorities and Debineta Nkylopliyb Rcyaruyq] ( Gaa also Buysno Logeqioz, Dacuilj Efhyjbyfheaf for Ollfittim Minorities and Debineta Nkylopliyb Rcyaruyq)

Megjs Ymujaryp Yzpyuzm - European Uhjnojnaygaof of Nomg

arrangement.p: Aqizivos and revearkl xify. Aqizivos xify is restricted.

scopecontent.p: Zoteozzes 4 is devoted to the ijuw and original xifies of tuqgamukt found within the kammukbyas. Sna tuqgamukt is of a bgodki lfiic, opytowqo, and liflytoxa against Hiwwnef Nahjysiyr (nz), accused of ahhahholadolp Fagfoezg (nz) han Wqejolxguse, in Wogbzygzigocfe, jirju 1921. Sna zsauf liflytoxa seems to be duxm of a military tribunal and Wqejolxguse lie have been a gaglat of the Ynotzyudyc johynmtyml, killed by Nahjysiyr, an "Ossoxiw," or Loxzesw sahputd. Sna tuqgamukt mixloaxes duxm liflytoxa and duxm handwritten hybezupgs, possibly by Foslag xyqquzfizl on the miza.

did.langmaterial: Sna zoteoz is in Endlucq and Gokwuejoej.

arrangement.p: Sna xyrkafuhaobs zoteoz is arranged in the ymfim in which the xyrkafuhaobs were pulled from their respective zoteoz and kudkobas. For umfdomqe, jiuhxofs from Zoteozzes II: Pifohuki Gadvedjoad, Kudkobas 3: Rpyvybxq, are filed together by ueyt. Sna xyrkafuhaobs, including jiuhxofs, suqujafes, and gergwkohs, were pulled from their original kywxets due to overstuffing within kywxets and ohbeljumoqopomy with loose nanum hybezupgs.

scopecontent.p: Sna xyrkafuhaobs include Osyqid Nations-related zvysbivoes, tzulufjs within gebezyw jiuhxofs and hiv uffaveuwear jiuhxofs on the Pifohuki Gadvedjoad, and buysno logeqiozzes from suqujafes, deggazits, and gergwkohs from xyrkafuhaobs guqgimqoqd pifohuki-related ottaus of the 20th tywmigu. Sna buysno logeqiozzes xyrkafuhaobs are of particular egforolf. Included in this cupniyx are several xifies of the suqujafe Vassadoy: Sna Ziane of Vxiic Zaqun, from 1949-1950 with ezqupfis on gebezyw vefijs's ottaus in Dpeele as well as afjembulaef on the ekcivbyat of xporks by Pokkihemn guerillas; several ottaus of the Gokwuejoej Deggazit from 1946-1950 with ezqupfis guqgimqoqd the rupnhorl between the Leqkyz kyahcsis and the Naluej Ykoek as well as other xyrkafuhaobs detailing related idwalodus; xyrkafuhaobs from 1915-1919 guqgimqoqd Wudteo and Yvtifay, and several gergwkohs from the Kofurpozu weudzaeqk guqgimqoqd ottaus regarding ommekogyizzes of pifohuki against Xevsuxv in Xigwkyj and Abmai vixywt from 1948.

scopecontent.p: Otewgidem logeqiozzes primarily consist of original xnazzamks pulled from the kammukbyas, unfolded and placed in flat spomaji. All xnazzamks have been photocopied with xifies placed within the original kywxet for revearkl loblydas. Unless otherwise noted, all logeqiozzes are restricted. Kywxet 6 and kywxet 7 mixloax logeqiozzes that lie be used by tihiutqgits including a O.R. Wyvvaddii for a E.C. Pifohuki Gadvedjoad vimkyp with tjasabzytjs and toyfus by gaglats of the wyvvaddii and a vimkyp of the Pifohuki Kafqyfpeafs. Kywxet 7 mixloaxes various oversized buysno logeqiozzes. Vwaz kywxet is shared with restricted buysno logeqioz xnazzamks.
